Break the rules

20.12.2025

Go to war, give up or negotiate?

There is only one important question in each family - does she see her brother in you, does see her father in you or does her mother see the son in you?

Do we develop nuclear fusion and make plasma swords, blow up the sky and go back to iron swords or do we develop quantum vacuum and put down the swords?

Or is the opinion that there is only one question wrong?

Are there 5 more most important questions?

How old are you?

How rich are you?

How tall are you?

How heavy are you?

How healthy are you?

There has got to be more than one question!
